StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Pooled Genome-wide Analysis of Kidney Cancer Risk

Person.Organization: INTERNATIONAL AGENCY FOR RES ON CANCER
INTERNATIONAL AGENCY FOR RES ON CANCER

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The kidney cancer GWAS project, funded by the NCI U01CA155309 (PI: G Scelo). Publication to be cited: pending.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Kidney Cancer, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-RCC-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Kidney Cancer. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer, NPU, GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA-NPU-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Cancer. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.
Data is available for cancer research relating to population structure (including research that may have applications or implications for the understanding of ancestral history, because of the information it may provide about allele frequencies in different populations). Data is NOT available for genetic research on non-cancer and/or non-disease traits (e.g., intelligence, behavioral traits). Data is NOT available for general methods development research,

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (PUB, NPU, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-PUB-NPU-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
